title: Inlaid box, from a cordial set
description: inlaid, rectangular, fluted box; hinged at top back; top front panel hinged at top and drops down when opened; sides hinged and swing out; four claw feet with four toes; inlaid cartouche on top and front panels; inlaid strips of light and dark wood define sides and top
creditline: Gift of Jan and Bill Spoor
